website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality set that delivers a good viewing experience for a lower price.
cons: The sound available on this model is just okay
Sometimes viewers experience blurring issues with high action

customer_reviews.title: Consumer Reports was right............GREAT TV!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I have to rely on Consumer Reports for purchases like this. With SOOOOO many brands and models to choose from, it is super tough to make an educated choice just by shopping the local stores. And just spending more and getting the supposedly "better" model isn't always the way to go..........some super pricey models don't perform as nicely as the more reasonable models many times. LG is a great brand and has a very good history as a very reliable brand as well. All I can tell you is that this 65 inch TV leaves me almost speechless sometimes.............the UHD/4K picture blows me away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo Craig

customer_reviews.title: Don't see how OLED could be that much better.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this TV for three weeks. Extremely pleased. The real refresh rate is 120, motion rate is 240. This makes a huge difference in watching sports.
customer_reviews.author: V. Laney

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value from LG!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is awesome! Color and claritybare amazing! The menus make sense and flow easily. I like mouse pointer/wii controller feel of the LG remote. Easy hook up to my home theater system with plenty of HDMI inputs. Beautiful picture and tons of features!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Lahr

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing TV set
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing TV set. I'm very pleased with the picture quality and viewing angle. The Smart remote is pretty cool once you figure out the features it offers. I was able to put away my DirecTV remote and use the smart remote. The setup is pretty easy even for a novice like myself. Really great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer, SC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the picture
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the picture! Sound is not right. music is too loud, voice is to soft. almost think you need a sound bar to balance sound
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV!
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I do not like about the TV. The picture is clear & crisp and I love the size!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Picture and color quality very good.
customer_reviews.text: We really like the television. The picture is clear and the colors distinct. We have had it a couple of months and believe it is very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Devonna Coleman

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is excellent, and the controller is versatile and not-too-hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: There were some initial issues with loss of sound when switching from one HDMI input source to another HDMI input source (eg, changing from Netflix to cable). I had to reboot the TV in order to get sound. This is a reported issue, but (perhaps since an OS update), I have not had the problem again. The picture quality is excellent, and the controller is versatile and not-too-hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chellie R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this TV. I even like the interface.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hill

customer_reviews.title: Pic is a little darker over all but definitely worth the momey
customer_reviews.text: TV is very easy to use, smart features are great. Picture is very life like!!
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: This is a 2017
customer_reviews.text: There is a 2018 version and I paid more for this 2017.
customer_reviews.author: paula mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, great viewing angles
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. We have been loving it for about 2 months now. Viewing angle is fine, 4K is great
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Incredible smart tv software
customer_reviews.text: Incredible smart tv software, great picture and has that "high end" look to it. For the price, it's a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It's, but gotta have a good pne
customer_reviews.text: Turned around before shipped, as realized not new, unused, but used!
customer_reviews.author: daniel s.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV. I bought this one because of the good review on an unbiased national review company, along with its relatively low price.
customer_reviews.author: Chad cook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the picture, good quality! Didn’t like the silver border!
customer_reviews.author: jayj4901

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great tv
customer_reviews.text: Picture is good, but not as good as I expected based on reviews that read. TV does not swivel on its stand, which would be useful. Controls easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Zen User

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this television.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased1/29/18. Died 8/24/19. It’s ridiculous to only get 19 months of use. Disappointing for an LG product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HOT TV
customer_reviews.text: hi every1 I give the seller 5 stars .......but I give the TV 10 stars . its HOT. no im not a Robot
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: tv came in a beat up box and the screen ...
customer_reviews.text: tv came in a beat up box and the screen was broken in two places, did not even get to power it on.
customer_reviews.author: frederick w becker

customer_reviews.title: Defective Model
customer_reviews.text: Tv had an awful vertical banding issue that was extremely distracting when watching any panning motion, especially bad watching hockey. I had this problem on 2 tv's of this same model number. Do not buy this model!
customer_reviews.author: TommyF

customer_reviews.title: Last LG I'll buy
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. Pointer disappears and tv gets really sluggish. Tons of people online with same issue, no resolution. Blacks are terrible. You get a vertical gray strip when it tries to contrast something with a black background.
customer_reviews.author: leeboy4130

customer_reviews.title: Best 65" out there right now for your money.
customer_reviews.text: I've only owned this TV briefly so far, but it has been a hit from the second I took it out of the box. The build quality is excellent, even the back of the TV looks really sleek and feels very solid. It took only minutes to fully set up using the automated walk through. The picture is amazing! I've had fun trying out various settings. The apps (Amazon, Netflix, etc) seem to work great. I don't notice any of the motion blur which has bothered me with previous LED TV sets. It's still new, but so far I have zero complaints and all the comparable TV's at this quality level seem to cost at least $200-300 more.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding picture quality !
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy. THe technicolor picture mode with very minor modifications is perfect. Make sure you have the lat at firmware (mine came with it). The colors and quality are just beautiful. All those arguing pointl Daly regarding RGBW vs rgb can still argue as the picture quality is amazing and I have seen no issue with backlighting. For the price I paid, could not be happier. Great build and quality
customer_reviews.author: RealTime_Review

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy with the picture for being a 4K
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with the picture for being a 4K. IT HAS A. BLURRY EFFECT, EVEN THE WRITING AND LETTERING HAVE A DOUBLE VISION LIKE BLUR . MY SAMSUNG 6500 HAS A MUCH CLEARER PICTURE AND IT IS 3 YRS. OLD. I HAVE TRIED MANY SETTING AND IT HAS NOT HELPED
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Wehrkamp

customer_reviews.title: Be warned
customer_reviews.text: LG's customer service is absolutely terrible. The warranty is a year (common for televisions regardless of manufacturer) however, after owning an LG for three years, it died over a three week period where it's video card began to die. Their products are typically fine in my experience, but when they fail, they fail spectacularly. Kind of ruins your day thinking about how much money you could have saved buying a different brand. Be warned, whenever possible, look for an extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S.

customer_reviews.title: terrible picture quality
customer_reviews.text: blurry picture. watching football the ball turns white almost clear when thrown. up close image of players very clear but when it shows the view for actively playing turns very blurry cant see names or logos. Problem happens with cable box and while streaming 4K Roku. Not acceptable for this type of TV
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this model
customer_reviews.text: Not a very clear picture the TV is extremely blurry for super HD. Only some movie/shows show properly and that's only when the actors are close. Can't even see the logo on the NFL players helmets, lower models have a better picture like UJ6540
customer_reviews.author: GURDAT
